firsttime.name: <:MX_Kordelia:1260950932536033363> Kordelia Gorua
firsttime.text: I'll teach you the basics of fighting.

beatmeupplease.name: <:MX_Kordelia:1260950932536033363> Kordelia Gorua
beatmeupplease.text:
First: attacking. Click <:MX_Sword:1220425813132836904> to attack me.
Don't worry. I'm tough.

beatmeupplease:followup.name: <:MX_Kordelia:1260950932536033363> Kordelia Gorua
beatmeupplease:followup.text: You encounter Kordelia on your way.

coverup.name: <:MX_Kordelia:1260950932536033363> Kordelia Gorua
coverup.text:
Nice. Now click <:MX_Shield:1220425815368400926> to increase your shield.
The higher it is the more you are proteced.

coverup:followup.name: <:MX_Kordelia:1260950932536033363> Kordelia Gorua
coverup:followup.text:
{u} attacks Kordelia using <:MX_IronSword:1139321518573223997> Iron Sword
Kordelia loses 30 HP

comefightme.name: <:MX_Kordelia:1260950932536033363> Kordelia Gorua
comefightme.text: Perfect. Now click any button you want to test your skills in practice.

idontbitedoi.name: <:MX_Kordelia:1260950932536033363> Kordelia Gorua
idontbitedoi.text: Don't try to run away. I don't bite.

idontwannadie.name: <:MX_Kordelia:1260950932536033363> Kordelia Gorua
idontwannadie.text:
Heh... You-u did it-t... You managed to beat me...
Click <:MX_Save:1220425821559455836> to finish the tutorial...

tutcomplete.name: Kordelia Gorua
tutcomplete.text:
I consider this tutorial as finished! You've shown to me what you can do and I really appreciate it. Come back here some day. When you come back I'll teach you about using multiple weapons and bundles.
See you later!
